segments.text: I still have a question to ask you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How much luggage can I take for my flight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is allowed to carry 55 pounds for each passenger .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But if I have more than 55 pounds , what can I do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You will have to pay some for every extra pound .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about my hand carry luggage ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can bring one , if you want to .
segments.speaker: S2
